entries.title: Samsung launches SmartThings Station to elevate smart home experience
entries.description: At CES, Samsung debuted its brand new smart home hub that doubles as a charging pad.

entries.title: The 5 best PC cases of 2023
entries.description: PCs are delicate computers, so it is critical that you do all you can to protect yours. The best PC cases not only protect your computer with a hard shell, but they can offer some pretty neat features, too.

entries.title: Hyte's new Y40 PC case brings its wraparound glass to a more traditional shape
entries.description: The company's follow-up to its massively popular Y60 keeps the all-glass front corner, but uses a more standard rectangular shape to define its mid-tower size.

entries.title: JBL launches eight new headphones, including the first-ever touchscreen pair
entries.description: At CES, JBL announced the newest additions to its earbud and over-ear headphones lineup.

entries.title: Asus's new laptops let you view art in 3D above the screen, without VR/AR glasses
entries.description: At CES 2023, Asus debuted the world's first glasses-free 3D OLED display, featured on the  ProArt Studiobook 16 and the Zenbook Pro 16X

entries.title: Asus's new laptops let you view art in 3D above the screen, without VR/AR glasses
entries.description: At CES 2023, Asus debuted the world's first glasses-free 3D OLED display, featured on the ProArt Studiobook 16 and the Zenbook Pro 16X.

entries.title: Samsung Knox security wants to lock down the rest of the devices in your house
entries.description: Exclusive interview: Samsung Knox Matrix has a plan to secure the smart devices across your home the way Samsung Knox has secured your Galaxy phone.

entries.title: Samsung has a plan to lock down all of the smart devices in your house
entries.description: Exclusive interview: Samsung Knox Matrix wants to secure the smart devices across your home the way Samsung Knox has secured your Galaxy phone.

entries.title: CES 2023: LG talks new Cockpit Computer, transparent OLED, color-changing fridge, and more
entries.description: LG commenced CES' second Media Day by talking about bright new innovations in product areas like TVs, appliances, and home safety tech.

entries.title: CES 2023: Hisense unveils new U6K, U7K, and U8K TVs
entries.description: The new smart TVs offer upgraded LED technology across up to 20,000 Mini LEDs.

entries.title: Nomad Goods launches $199 aluminum Apple Watch bands
entries.description: If you love the look and feel of a metal Apple Watch band but don't want to spend a lot, then Nomad's new aluminum band has your name on it.

entries.title: This Lenovo gaming monitor is $200 off in Newegg sale
entries.description: Assert yourself as the best teammate in your squad with this Lenovo gaming monitor that's currently seeing a discount of $200 during Newegg's 22nd Anniversary sale.

entries.title: CES 2023: New smart toilet tech tracks your health stats
entries.description: You can check your health every time you use the bathroom for the cool price of $500.

entries.title: CES 2023: New Drop compact speakers blanket your desk with sound for under $130
entries.description: The tiny speakers, debuting at CES 2023, use multiple radiators to pack "holographic" sound into a package that can fit on even the smallest desks.

entries.title: Attention Apple AirTag users: Don't ignore this warning
entries.description: Do as I say, not as I do.

entries.title: ASUS unveils two sustainably designed laptops for business executives and students
entries.description: At CES, Asus drops two new laptops that have sustainability and durability at the forefront.

entries.title: The Garmin Instinct Crossover grew on me. I just wish it had this one killer feature
entries.description: Review: Garmin released a lot of watches in 2022 and the last one to be launched marries the sleek hybrid Vivomove with the chunky rugged Instinct in the form of the Instinct Crossover.

entries.title: Asus' new Vibe CX34 gaming Chromebook brings high-end specs
entries.description: When Acer, Asus, and Lenovo launched the first trio of gaming Chromebooks, Asus' entry had the weakest default hardware. Now, the company is back with a new follow-up that can go toe-to-toe with just about any Chromebook out there.

entries.title: Headphones deal: Score the Anker Q20 cans for only $45
entries.description: The Anker Q20 offer up to 40 hours of playback and a deep bass for all your jam sessions. And they're 25% off.

entries.title: Why these USB lithium-ion battery chargers are must-haves for my tool bag
entries.description: One of these pocket-sized battery chargers has even revived batteries I thought were dead forever.

entries.title: Samsung just launched its cheapest 5G Galaxy phone yet
entries.description: The Samsung Galaxy A14 5G made its debut at CES 2023 and comes with an improved camera and four years of security updates.

entries.title: Samsung's new $200 5G Galaxy phone has a better camera and bigger screen
entries.description: Te Samsung Galaxy A14 5G costs under $200 and and comes with an improved camera.

entries.title: CES 2023: Roku builds its own TVs for the first time
entries.description: The streaming device retailer is expanding into creating living room worthy displays that will be available later this year.

entries.title: How to change your Android device name to simplify Bluetooth connectivity
entries.description: If you connect third-party devices to your Android phone via Bluetooth, there's one simple thing you can do to make this considerably easier.

entries.title: LG unveils a 97-inch M3 OLED TV at CES 2023
entries.description: The M3 is a great option for those that want the top-quality picture without the setup hassle.

entries.title: CES 2023: Eve Systems unveils new Matter-certified smart home devices
entries.description: Eve continues to add Matter support to all of its smart home devices.

entries.title: Don't waste your money on these Apple products: January 2023 edition
entries.description: Here's what you should and shouldn't buy from Apple this month.

entries.title: How to enable UWB on Android (and why you should)
entries.description: If you're curious as to what UWB is, how it can benefit you, and how to enable it on Android phones, read on.

entries.title: Belkin announces recycled plastic initiative at CES 2023
entries.description: As Belkin turns 40, the company is getting serious about sustainability. The first "responsibly-built" Belkin products will debut later this year.

entries.title: These grim figures show that the ransomware problem isn't going away
entries.description: There's still huge disruption from ransomware attacks - and there's no sign that criminals intend to give up.

entries.title: This new Bike Desk will let you charge your laptop - by pedaling
entries.description: At CES 2023, Acer unveiled the eKinekt BD 3, which lets you get a workout and charge your devices all at once.

entries.title: Laptops, Chromebooks, All-in-one PCs, and more: Take a look at HP's hybrid-focused device portfolio
entries.description: HP is targeting hybrid workers, freelancers and gamers with its CES 2023 lineup, which also has a strong sustainability theme running through it.

entries.title: HyperX launches new line of 3D-printed keycaps, headphone backplates, and more
entries.description: The company is leveraging the flexibility of parent company HP's 3D-printing technology to offer a new line of add-ons to customize and re-style its gaming peripherals.

entries.title: HyperX's CES 2023 lineup includes Haste 2 mice, Clutch Gladiate Xbox controller
entries.description: The company's hit Haste and Haste Wireless are both getting a less-perforated follow-up, while it also expands its offerings to include an officially-licensed Xbox controller.

entries.title: iPhone MagSafe-style wireless charging could soon be everywhere. Including your Android phone
entries.description: Apple's technology forms the core of the new Qi2 standard.

entries.title: ChatGPT's next big challenge: Helping Microsoft to challenge Google search
entries.description: Microsoft could redefine search on the internet by integrating OpenAI's ChatGPT chatbot with Bing, according to a report.

entries.title: Save $270 on the SanDisk 2TB Extreme portable SSD at B&H
entries.description: B&H's offer on a portable, rugged hard drive is not to be missed.

entries.title: Save $270 on the SanDisk 2TB Extreme portable SSD
entries.description: B&H's offer on a portable, rugged hard drive is not to be missed.

entries.title: Groundbreaking wireless TV ditches the remote and sticks to any wall without a mount
entries.description: Upstart TV maker Displace surprised CES 2023 with an innovative TV set that's modular, wireless, gesture-based, and has an actual price tag.

entries.title: CES 2023: SwitchBot launches Matter-supported Hub 2
entries.description: The SwitchBot Hub 2, which is making its debut at CES 2023, also features a display with a humidity and temperature sensor.

entries.title: CES 2023 Day 1: The biggest announcements so far
entries.description: It's Day 1 of the largest tech conference in the US, and here are the biggest announcements from major companies.

entries.title: CES 2023: AMD, BMW headline the tech show on Wednesday
entries.description: The CEOs of AMD and BMW deliver keynote remarks at CES on Wednesday, while you can expect plenty of news from other companies including Sony, Samsung and LG Electronics.

entries.title: CES 2023: Kholer's Sprig Shower System showers you in serotonin
entries.description: Combining aromatherapy and technology, Kohler's Sprig Shower Infusion System takes self-care seriously.

entries.title: CES 2023: Kholer's Sprig Shower System showers you in calming scents
entries.description: Combining aromatherapy and technology, Kohler's Sprig Shower Infusion System takes self-care seriously.

entries.title: Nanoleaf announces Matter-compatible smart lighting at CES 2023
entries.description: Products range from smart light bulbs and strips to a new automation learning assistant. Plus, a unique way to mirror the colors shown on your TV with Nanoleaf lights.

entries.title: A slew of new Alienware gaming laptops to emerge at CES 2023: Here's what to know
entries.description: Alienware, a Dell subsidiary, announced an expansive lineup of new-and-improved gaming laptops, including Dell gaming laptops that will operate with Alienware's interface.
